entry.title: WIND WARNING, Red Deer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 a.m. MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few rain showers beginning late this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 60 gusting to 90 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
